introduction: In this video, we will be discussing the concept of consistency hashing and its application in distributed systems. Consistency hashing is a technique used for consistent hashing and it's a technique that helps to map a hash function to a specific server in a distributed system. We will discuss the basics of consistency hashing and its applications in distributed systems.

sections.title: Section 1: Consistency Hashing
content: Discuss the basic idea of consistency hashing
Explain the benefits of consistency hashing

sections.title: Section 2: Consistency Hashing in Practice
content: Explain how consistency hashing is used in practice
Explain the limitations of consistency hashing
Explain the benefits of consistency hashing
sections.title: Section 3: Distributed Systems Architecture
content: Explain what is a distributed system
Explain how a distributed system works
Explain the benefits of a distributed system
